0152e0b1caeb6a12.voiceContent: #(Drat, I wasn't expecting them. And now {NICKNAME} probably caught me yelling at Ororon... Aah, this is not a good look for me!

02f2bc4ce212a77f.voiceContent: I have to return the ceremonial sword to the chief shortly, but I'll leave everything else in the camp as-is for now. Feel free to make use of it

0432c156dab5e7ad.voiceContent: I'll lend you some of my power like last time, so you can use my clairvoyance. It only works if you use this projection censer first though, so don't forget that step

04934cd5150056ea.voiceContent: That's right. He was not only one of the six heroes, but also a legendary Border Master of our tribe. Five hundred years on, and the remains of his spirit is still so strong..

04f7f98baad0792b.voiceContent: Must be one of the mechanics of the maze

05dc6cf01c0a7a5a.voiceContent: Alright, I'm heading out. See you guys later

07ea2dbc1f63fbd9.voiceContent: You feel that? It might look old, but it has extremely strong traces of spiritual energy

0a2e9a8995f45f7b.voiceContent: Sorry, can't talk now. You'll find me in the cave

0cb9fece85adda89.voiceContent: ...! The nerve! I only got involved because of you, you little scamp

0dee8fb463f55767.voiceContent: Hey! That's enough, you little squirt. Since when does the grandkid call the shots? Granny obviously knows how to handle this

0e19449c1e5752eb.voiceContent: Hmph, and I wouldn't have stopped him if it was anyone else. But the issue is, Mr. Leyla here is what we call a spirit-duffer.

0e7d37e98f14338c.voiceContent: Oh? You sure about that? Then say goodbye to your parents. Tell them this

108b90c8cfe22db5.voiceContent: You know, acting out some scenes from a light novel, quoting the lines... I didn't actually mean what I was saying. Right, Ororon

10ad5abe71da22b9.voiceContent: (This Kokuchuu must be a real escape artist or something. But I can't tell them that. I'll have to think of something else...

110f62c409fe4c56.voiceContent: You hear that? No prizes for guessing what Ororon's bright idea was

130d23fb3c795aae.voiceContent: Hehe, don't thank me â€” thank my grandson. If he hadn't sensed something was amiss, I wouldn't have bothered getting involved

1456441643837e1e.voiceContent: Glory be to the Ruler of Death. Fade. Fade. Fade. Thrice uttered, and thrice repeated

157f7827ee0443c0.voiceContent: Good work, kiddo. Then without further ado, let's get started

15fd016cb3d8531b.voiceContent: Well, luckily I made some progress on my end. Leyla's parents told me that he made a new friend recently, and apparently, he's been out of the house for days at a time

1726ed7e5e5a5135.voiceContent: Yeah, some guy who goes by the name Kokuchuu. Dressed in what looked like Inazuman attire

1915760001076661.voiceContent: Abyss creatures, likely trapped here for some time..

1a6902fc88a12b47.voiceContent: This is what age does to you. The older you get, the less adventurous you become

1ce96e9445068135.voiceContent: Quick, this way. We're almost there

1d401eabcbaec095.voiceContent: That's right. I've been wondering about the shard he left ever since I came across it. Why did he leave it there

1e3332bd7601c00f.voiceContent: Yeah, he's napping right behind that wall. We'd have a whole new situation on our hands if we woke him up. That's why I decided against using my full abilities

1ef8ef0e36065261.voiceContent: Quite a strong reaction this time. Does this mean what he was really seeking was the Mare Jivari's location

20414f293d0f2f11.voiceContent: Could it be... the Mare Jivari

20b55561687d292c.voiceContent: Ororon, give this guy some lessons when you've got the time

213406a50996bbd3.voiceContent: #(Still... {F#s}he remembered, that's gotta mean something, right? Why make a note of some mundane detail like that?

2143deed17cf3687.voiceContent: They say his border mastery was what turned the tide in the Battle of the Mare Jivari five hundred years ago. Legend has it that Sanhaj summoned a miniature Night Kingdom and exploded it to defeat the encroaching dark calamity

226ccafec24f81a1.voiceContent: No, not like me. The most powerful Border Masters can expand the borders of the Night Kingdom, and temporarily manifest part of it in the real world

235d33d8824c965a.voiceContent: Guilty conscience, huh? So you know full well what you've done

2ee8e0edb74d77ed.voiceContent: Don't kid yourself. What happens if it's not as safe as you're hoping, hmm? We both know you'll risk it all to try and rescue him anyway. Honestly, you're such an idiot sometimes

2f120eeb7baa662d.voiceContent: But don't worry, now that his spirit's returned, there just one step left. Let's meet up again in two days

34a7cca10fa99084.voiceContent: Someone triggered the trap I set in the cave. Looks like our friend Kokuchuu took the bait

3936b8b2bd0d04a6.voiceContent: You see? You can perceive some spiritual abnormalities now. Congratulations

3bc9467158751f15.voiceContent: Hold on â€” if we step here, we might fall through

3cbc5a8302c81e8f.voiceContent: Let's put the sphere down, and see what happens

3d6597b64faa4dc0.voiceContent: #Also, Leyla â€” if it's all the same to you, I'd like to give the shard and map to {NICKNAME} as a gift. They might prove useful at some point in {M#his}{F#her} journey

3f9b43c3b18db037.voiceContent: #(Ugh, focus! {F#She}{M#He} asked me a question! Umm, umm, umm... Argh, how do I respond?

4090ca49bbf7f5e5.voiceContent: #(What is this? What's going on? How did {F#s}he know I like those books? Don't tell me... Has {F#she}{M#he} been trying to find out what I'm into?

412df77f065369ce.voiceContent: What!? ...Don't think I won't revisit this later

4136f2022f9c2e51.voiceContent: Hah, the brainwashing is strong with this one

4257eb90b0d57570.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME}, just over there is my spiritloom, which will record the fragments I see during clairvoyance. Once I begin, please arrange them on a woven scroll for me

43576188f652dc8b.voiceContent: Hey! What are you blabbing on about

464a47809d000a60.voiceContent: Yes! I mean, it's a crude solution... but that's beside the point! The point being, don't interfere when Granny's already got things under control

49deba9cf06845c5.voiceContent: Because I planted the bait here. The Mare Jivari map and the bow shard â€” left them both on the table. I had a feeling those were what he was truly after

4aa103d9cbf4dd2f.voiceContent: (That little brat, I swear... I just hope he hasn't gotten himself into any real trouble.

4cca0c3f5acaafec.voiceContent: I know this is your first time working with it, but I have a feeling you'll do great

4d51d3f4c1e4630a.voiceContent: I got the ceremonial sword from the chief. It has a certain power that's needed in situations like this

4ed274f847f9956c.voiceContent: Don't worry, I'll keep tracking him

524523685e8325d7.voiceContent: What kind of a dumb question is that? You saw through my illusion, didn't you? I mean, that's partly because I deliberately made it imperfect, but even then, a spirit-duffer wouldn't be able to see through that

525f04f0562c0028.voiceContent: At the westernmost part of Natlan. It's a very remote location, far away from any of the tribes. There never used to be a settlement there, but there's been more people since the Mare Jivari disappeared

53367135f6ce2679.voiceContent: If we can find out what mystery Leyla wanted to learn the truth of, we can use that to draw his lost spirit back here

536f0f7a090523f1.voiceContent: Ehh, none of us are interested in them. And if there's any chance of them leading you to the Mare Jivari, I'm sure an adventurer like you wouldn't want to pass on that opportunity

53ee7cf9dea5bb7e.voiceContent: And sure enough, my trap was triggered just moments after we left

540eddfd49a6a0c1.voiceContent: ...Yes, it's the weapon Sanhaj used in the Battle of the Mare Jivari. I guess that proves it â€” this shard is a bona fide Sanhaj relic

559cd6f294b3ede8.voiceContent: Now that you're one of the six heroes, you think you can do as you please, do you? Hmm

568935f98926701d.voiceContent: Tch... The showmanship's not bad, I'll give her that

57c65547a4333f33.voiceContent: You can leave Ororon to sift through them and find Leyla. Since he wants to help so bad, he can take the hardest job

5a588792b57420e2.voiceContent: I'm guessing the purpose is to help allies navigate this place..

5c3833a8232c1168.voiceContent: I figured. It was written all over your face. It's alright, I didn't exactly have high hopes for the needle-in-a-haystack approach anyway

5c6caf07be255c1d.voiceContent: That lasted up until around twenty or thirty years ago, when strange things started happening. People started speaking of an enormous, dark creature the size of a mountain roaming inside the Mare Jivari..

5e825b0ac8758623.voiceContent: #Oh no â€” you're staying right here, mister! {NICKNAME} has enough to do already without coming to your rescue

5eeb64d58d9d57c8.voiceContent: Uhhh... Because I couldn't risk using my full abilities here. He was a pretty slippery character, and if I'd kept him here by force, there could have been unintended consequences

5f0401bbc9455ee5.voiceContent: I shall pierce the cloak of night with flintstone, and banish all souls that do not belong to the land of the dead

6013d2a32617d0a2.voiceContent: Someone with no spiritual sensitivity whatsoever. Spirit-duffers can't sense or control spirits, much less use spells on them

613cb6b4d0980e74.voiceContent: Well, technically the soul and the spirit aren't quite the same thing... but yes, in a nutshell, that's basically it

64d9c0a3213e2cf4.voiceContent: I'm starting to feel like something else is at play here. I think I'll pay a visit to his house and see if I can find any clues

6a4a55db2b703b50.voiceContent: #(Ugh, focus! {F#She}{M#He} asked me a question! Umm, umm, umm... Argh, how do I respond?

6b461c0708f59ce0.voiceContent: Looks like a few monsters made it out of the battle all those years ago

6d6db29c9248effb.voiceContent: He was counting on Leyla's spirit getting lost, and the tribe coming to his rescue. Then, by helping Leyla, we'd be helping him..

6e91521e7216b7c1.voiceContent: I give offerings from the mystic smoke The gift of stars on a moonless night, a wreath of dreams in the swirling wind

712995153df488e0.voiceContent: Seems like the plan is working

73acb51c42314b37.voiceContent: It's a kind of spell that lets your spirit leave your body, so you can access secret knowledge. You know what a medium is, right? You've probably come across them in novels. Anyway, it's similar to that

73d5e31a068e3a77.voiceContent: The ashes of the monsters and warriors who fought there covered the entire battlefield. Sometimes, bone-chilling cries would be heard from the depths. Other times, the whole region would become engulfed in towering flames, drowning out the cries..

7749bf0a92d769b7.voiceContent: But before that, it looks like we now have another problem on our hands. Connecting with the spirit of Sanhaj Kompore has caused quite a stir... I think we may have just spooked all the monsters in the area

775c040224288c2c.voiceContent: Also, why use a spirit-duffer in that case? You're basically setting yourself up for failure

78047105cd229420.voiceContent: I'm no amateur with border spells, but Sanhaj is in a league of his own

7a4811d1d0a96eb7.voiceContent: As for this Kokuchuu fellow... I'm sure he has his own agenda. He conveniently disappeared right after Leyla got into this mess

7b9c9467a6ad6374.voiceContent: #I might have an idea... {NICKNAME}, try removing that sphere

7d6151e0b0b0a85d.voiceContent: Do you have any idea how close you were to never making it back? Or maybe you thought life would be more fun as an inanimate object

7e4af9eb174e7f7e.voiceContent: Are you ready? Don't worry, the spiritloom is very easy to use

815390ccd64a91b9.voiceContent: Now, there are certain methods that can force even spirit-duffers into a clairvoyant state, but... well, I mean, look what happened to Mr. Leyla

826f5726c5eeeefd.voiceContent: Hehe, you're darn right Granny Itztli's got a plan! Why else do you think I'd be here

82a5a2dc4527bdb3.voiceContent: Not today. You might think bringing a spirit back into its body is like pouring water from one bottle into another, but it's far more complicated than that

862cd3c462c3de58.voiceContent: A broken shard... probably from a weapon or some sort of ceremonial implement

87d63ebb351e6775.voiceContent: #(Drat, I wasn't expecting them. And now {NICKNAME} probably caught me yelling at Ororon... Aah, this is not a good look for me!

8b8a00c6b256dc38.voiceContent: (I don't believe it! He got away! Oh, this is terrible... Why'd I have to go and act so cocky about it? Ugh, I'm gonna look like such a fool...

8c3afff1175f3bfa.voiceContent: In that case, let me try again â€” this time using both Leyla's body and the shard as mediums

8d6e32bf68925a52.voiceContent: Huh? HUH??? When did you guys..

8e9756d113130424.voiceContent: Haha... Hello there, you two. We were just, um... Ororon and I, we were, uh... play acting..

8f996f588a199dfd.voiceContent: Leyla, put in the work and we'll see how far you get

93cdbf31a7f8ad31.voiceContent: Leave the vegetables and aphids behind, you dimwit! It's too dangerous

94098f74f70a7dd2.voiceContent: On one occasion, they secretly followed him, and saw him and his friend tinkering around with something at a camp

94ca85f2f91985b7.voiceContent: Goodbye, Mom and Dad. I've realized I enjoy life as an empty shell so much that I've decided to get Granny Itztli to turn me into a stone statue, so I can stand guard over her house for the next hundred years.

9532b386a18b27a4.voiceContent: Hmph, it's anything but novel. Our tribe used to offer it as a treatment once upon a time, but it was so fraught with risks and had such an abysmal success rate that it was eventually outlawed

954ea75fb919731c.voiceContent: Once the gateway is activated, all roaming spirits in the area will be drawn to it. If we're lucky, we'll find the one that belongs to Leyla

967bd3a1a8954b14.voiceContent: Nope, Ororon can do the recording this time

97e6e4b40bfe2104.voiceContent: The moment I confirmed the Mare Jivari's location, that's when I realized It was bait

99cc108addb6add2.voiceContent: I believe that's how the Ruler of Death keeps an eye on Teyvat..

99de9371667e9a3e.voiceContent: I intend to use a two-pronged approach. The first is the crude method â€” basically, it's looking for a needle in a haystack

9b0bffb355fadf76.voiceContent: Leyla must have used this as his medium. It would definitely explain how a spirit-duffer like him was able to trigger a clairvoyant experience

9c09ad22dd5a070c.voiceContent: #Oh no â€” you're staying right here, mister! {NICKNAME} has enough to do already without coming to your rescue

9c75d0c5b9619526.voiceContent: I do have some good news, though I snatched the shard and map back before he bolted. So I may have restrained myself, but I certainly didn't let him walk all over me

9d730e8db9e6e3eb.voiceContent: ...I thought I'd let him go. For now

a1f8d1220cb9f4d0.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME}, if you've got some time, could you go and get them to pipe down a bit? We don't want them to start attacking innocent bystanders

a78dca3308fd7de2.voiceContent: (No, that's ridiculous, don't be silly... I bet Ororon sold me out, the little scamp...

a8ebd2091a2e88d7.voiceContent: Alright, if you insist, be my guest. Just let me know when you're ready

aa15be1ac4b086f1.voiceContent: You got the itch too, huh

aa2e42e4701f5464.voiceContent: Hey! That's Granny Itztli to you! Who do you take me for? I obviously know how to handle this

ab47f0e915e1f229.voiceContent: Well? Explain yourself, you dummy! How exactly were you thinking of helping that spirit-duffer

ab711ee6da3ee169.voiceContent: Anyway, that's just what I've heard. I've never been there myself

ac9a42f884bf8b63.voiceContent: I know, right? Anyway, if I'm not mistaken, the place indicated on this map is where it used to be before it disappeared

ad009ef062b8a907.voiceContent: Of course. It's just that they'd never do anything to either of you

b0fe47c2d1056214.voiceContent: I am Citlali, hear my command. I am the shepherd of doomsday, I am Ah K'ulbatil

b1e34d9ea45a15a9.voiceContent: So... no good news for me, then

b6dfd8bf955f6e3c.voiceContent: #(Still... {F#s}he remembered, that's gotta mean something, right? Why make a note of some mundane detail like that?

ba010698cf5a3015.voiceContent: Where do you think? I'm going fishing, you dummy

ba508eef66b2e03d.voiceContent: Uh, yes, sort of... The bad news is, he did get a look at the map before he left. Not that the Mare Jivari's last-known location is a huge secret, but still..

ba84f0ab54d8b4c5.voiceContent: Leyla's problem is, his spirit has gotten lost and can't find its way back to his body

baf41aaa79ad2f8f.voiceContent: I said look at me. Take a good hard look. Sense anything strange

bafef88b4627f3a6.voiceContent: Remember how we were able to pass through the wall just now? It must have been because, on our person, we were carrying the same color as the wall

be21fa99a57ed345.voiceContent: I don't know what Leyla was thinking... Even I'd think twice before seeking out Sanhaj Kompore during clairvoyance, so what sort of spirit-duffer in their right mind would... Hmph, I guess folly is the greater part of bravery

bedec4bd0210233f.voiceContent: So if they get into trouble trying to use a spell, there's basically nothing we can do

bf79980a72fc10d0.voiceContent: Let's pause this discussion for now. We need to get you to Matla's for a checkup

c02724d8091900af.voiceContent: All grown up now, are we

c224e60f3b940f27.voiceContent: We, the children of the priest-king, swear to abide by the ancient pact, and tear through the veil of the Night Realm

c2eb5976c2f394d7.voiceContent: I'll do some clairvoyance of my own, and channel it through Leyla's body. That should give me some idea of what he was thinking

c41545886d7592f1.voiceContent: Hmph, you can't flatter your way out of this one! But you're not wrong. A person without a spirit is just a physical shell â€” which, for our purposes, makes them an inanimate object

c4bde106077318be.voiceContent: Hold on a second! There's a spirit approaching the shard and the woven scroll

c831bcf693bc48fe.voiceContent: Of course, it came at a great price. As far as I understand, both Sanhaj and Tenoch, the leader of the tribal coalition forces, gave their lives to activate this spell

d087c170a1e2face.voiceContent: Granny Itztli has a sense for these things

d0f5e5d17a2fb2a3.voiceContent: Leyla! Obey my command, and return to the land where the sun shines. Return to your own path

d179173e3a2e08f8.voiceContent: Draw him back, using what I know about the instincts of spirits. As we all know, clairvoyance is usually conducted with the goal of unraveling mysteries

d23e05ec81382313.voiceContent: ...You haven't forgotten what we're doing today, right

d2d9234fe4ddcc2a.voiceContent: Don't worry, this time nothing can go wrong! You'll just feel like you're in the Night Kingdom, and you'll see a lot of roaming spirits around you. All you need to do is gather them up

e1b031e7985fd9c3.voiceContent: Let me take a look. I can sense a spirit being drawn to the relic..

e61eac418d355ec2.voiceContent: #(What is this? What's going on? How did {F#s}he know I like those books? Don't tell me... Has {F#she}{M#he} been trying to find out what I'm into?

e6401df945c500fd.voiceContent: I still think there's more to this story, though. Kokuchuu must have had his own motives beyond just treating Leyla's condition

e7a51c026789fc4c.voiceContent: Shoot, they're blocking the way forward... Let's get rid of them

ea0b059d9d3a1927.voiceContent: #Also, Leyla â€” if it's all the same to you, I'd like to give the shard and map to {NICKNAME} as a gift. They might prove useful at some point in {M#his}{F#her} journey

ea0f6f927212b0c2.voiceContent: #You have a better understanding of the spirit domain than {NICKNAME}. If this really is a Sanhaj relic, you'll be better placed to deal with the fallout in the event that something goes wrong

eb7a40a4d57b19b2.voiceContent: Yep. And somebody fell for it hook, line, and sinker..

ed8895109c88e84c.voiceContent: That place is full of untold dangers and mysteries. Over the centuries, the finest adventurers have tried to prove themselves by venturing in... Sadly, most ended up perishing there

eeb28122470ae66e.voiceContent: The Mare Jivari was reduced to a desolate wasteland after that big battle. Or rather, it became known as the Mare Jivari after what happened there

ef89b567e7acacc7.voiceContent: See the thing I've drawn around Leyla's body? That's a gateway to the Night Kingdom

f09680a66c279f74.voiceContent: But I left a mark on him! So if he comes around here again, I'll be able to track his every move

f0b6e1a9d72884df.voiceContent: Okay, that's it, Granny's getting itchy clairvoyance fingers. I'm going to try using this shard as a medium

f1ef53248591202e.voiceContent: Yeah â€” Leyla's his name. He got into some trouble during a clairvoyance session

f3ec0c8aa349fc63.voiceContent: Sure, why not. I should have some time later. I'll let you know

f419a1799511d3e1.voiceContent: #Anyway. {NICKNAME}, I was actually going to ask for your help on this. My plan will take quite a lot of work, and it's a little too much for one person

f58c5d12d6373eae.voiceContent: Yep, you can keep gathering the roaming spirits, that won't be affected. Hopefully you do find Leyla that way, because it'll save us an awful lot of trouble..

f88aafda140943ae.voiceContent: Leyla's parents gave me the address of the camp, so I went and checked it out. There were clear traces of spiritual energy, and also... look what I found

f91e17f157dd821a.voiceContent: Don't sound so surprised. We just need to cross, and we should reach the end

fa849788e780099d.voiceContent: Still trying to resist? You've got no idea who you're up against

fbac4cc29148c748.voiceContent: Hey, you little rascal. What are you talking about? Look at me

fbafb9554124e5c3.voiceContent: Let me know when you're ready. We should get to work

fc3036d516c74b38.voiceContent: The spells of the Masters of the Night-Wind are all based on dealing with spirits, and so are all our problem-solving methods. So for spirit-duffers, even our healing methods don't work on them

fdb870e485d24aaa.voiceContent: I need to borrow a ceremonial sword, and make some other preparations. It'll take me about two days

ff0190ff8cdc6e1a.voiceContent: And then, shortly after that, the whole region just completely disappeared. Nobody knows how, but that infamously ominous place just vanished from the face of the world

02c4f9e2ec953084.voiceContent: Iâ€”I treat you just like everyone else, I swear! Fine, the people in my tribe only know me through rumors that have been around for generations. But, you see the real me. My confident and uninhibited persona is just an act, because that's what people expect out of me... But, the awkwardness, the anxiety, the uncertainty â€” that's who I really am. I won't lie to you, but don't expect me to pour my heart out more than once

0738228e2607a595.voiceContent: I don't know her that well, but I do know light novels... Someone who's that powerful despite her size must have some kind of power-up that she uses to shoot up to seven feet tall and fight with 200% strength

18dcc3290ca571a1.voiceContent: We should be able to see the stars tonight

29ee2ed8051a0804.voiceContent: Going into a trance is risky for most people, so don't get any ideas

29f8c5b5a5e60449.voiceContent: *sigh* Other than my seniority in the tribe, I really don't know what I can offer you. Your allies are powerful, and your future is bright â€” you should be perfectly fine on your own... Besides, shouldn't an old-timer like me be allowed to relax at home all day? Unless you need me to get someone to fall in line... Wait, you don't really need that, right

35308faf7afa2b55.voiceContent: First, I like my meat cooked medium, so it retains some of the original flavor of a sacrificial offering. Next would be anything that's easy to eat with one hand so I can read at the same time. Oh, and then anything you recommend, of course

37c2a843f956c38e.voiceContent: The heavens control human fate like a puppeteer controls a marionette. So, the inauspicious stars themselves do not have free will. But, once I seal their power inside of a doll and bind it with animal bones, the residual thoughts within the bones allow them to develop awareness. I call these, uh, little creations, Tzitzimimeh. You can think of them as manifestations of the inauspicious stars

37eee3c028ef5d1a.voiceContent: ...You, young lady over there, turn around and let me have a look. Ah, so this is from The Case Files of Miss Orith. I thought it was the second female lead from Great Detective Herlock. All Fontaine clothes look the same to me. Alright, you can be on your way now. That's all I wanted to say

3d473ecea965fa65.voiceContent: The Ode of Resurrection can bring back our physical bodies, but everything will meet its end one day, even the sun and the stars. Oh, you want to know what death is like? Picture an afternoon suspended in time â€” you're riding a Saurian through a vast plain, and an unknown figure stands on the horizon. No matter how fast you ride, the figure is always out of reach â€” until it charges toward you without warning. There's nowhere to hide, and when you come face to face, that is the end

41c9b4dc85507a1c.voiceContent: Mâ€”Must be something wrong with my tastebuds, ahahaha..

41f12502cbe05138.voiceContent: Huh, I don't usually eat things like this... No, wait! I'm not saying it's bad! You... introduced me to a new flavor! It's a compliment â€” cross my heart

4756ff010aa2658b.voiceContent: Go on, take them. I'll thank the stars for you later

51ece6f4cdb46492.voiceContent: Afternoon! I'm someone with a lot of restraint, y'know. After I wake up, I never drink before noon... Although, sometimes it takes me all night to perform a ceremony and I don't sleep at all. So, no promises when that happens..

53646b7c81ce91db.voiceContent: So, the shaman masters in my tribe trick their students into forming a grudge against me, but do you want to know how? This is the most traditional method â€” say you were cheated by a scammer, then send your students to graffiti the scammer's house. With a little righteous indignation on your side, you can get them to do anything! See how unfair that is? At least most people can recognize my house from a random scammer now, so I don't get that one as much

60bb00c96bdb4f01.voiceContent: In a way, obtaining a Vision is like gaining a powerful ally. But, saying someone has powerful allies is more of a comment on how extraordinary that person already is. After all, allies only augment your existing strength. Unleashing that strength depends entirely on your own will

62bf5ec7d0241f21.voiceContent: Happy birthday! Honestly, I don't know what to get you. There are no inauspicious stars in your path. Whether in regard to love, battle, or your future endeavors, your prospects seem great. A Mictlan-style blessing won't do much for you. I thought about getting you a copy of Flowers for Princess Fischl to get you hooked on light novels, but it seems like someone owns more books from Yae Publishing House than me... Ahh, what to do... what to do

658924d6efca4c10.voiceContent: *spitting noise* Oh, that wasn't me spitting on the ground. I know better than that! I just had some sand in my mouth, I swear

6696081d631a5b92.voiceContent: Whoa, this is delicious! I've tried every place around the Masters of the Night-Wind, and I've never had anything as amazing as this â€” I swear

75ce1458186bbe74.voiceContent: Good night! The obscuring smoke and spirits of the earth are in a light slumber, and the inauspicious stars are faint â€” a fine evening by all accounts. Wait, how did my pillow get on the floor..

7d818ac8ce9700b2.voiceContent: Iâ€”I've read almost every novel from Yae Publishing House. Pâ€”Pretty normal, right

826c89a5a8e73706.voiceContent: Huh? Where is this coming from all of a sudden? Did you hear one of the rumors about me? *sigh* Fine, it's true! I'm the oldest, strangest, and scariest shaman in the tribe. Believe what you want â€” I gave up explaining myself a long time ago

898d346d2e44b1d5.voiceContent: Heh, Mavuika... *ahem* I mean, the Archon came to talk to me the other day. It wasn't until I was eating snacks in the middle of the night that I realized she was basically bragging the whole time! There's an ancient saying from another land that goes, Saints are humble until you ask them about their duty â€” that's when their pride stands tall. I think that fits her perfectly

8b573c34c2d5ceec.voiceContent: From this point on, I will always be by your side â€” until the stars diminish, the flames die out, and the smoke dissipates into nothing

8e7a98aadb3449ee.voiceContent: According to legend, there was once a special kind of cactus in Natlan that my master's master called the mescalito. Eating it is supposed to allow even mortal eyes to see into another realm. It was just all a rumor, of course â€” I have no idea if it still exists. But, if you ever see one, don't try it, okay

999e9db7f1209c28.voiceContent: That's right. I put on an act in front of other people, but this is my real personality. It's pretty simple, actually. If people expect you to speak like an old-timer with an accent, and you respond with elegant, standard speech, people will be shocked out of their minds. Yeah, you're right â€” it's the stupidity of ignorance. But, ignorance is the hardest thing to overcome. After all, when we first met, I didn't expect you to be any different from the rest of them

9a7b7119bce4d414.voiceContent: Hm, not bad. It's all yours

9dcbb2bceedd5e7b.voiceContent: Argh! I've never seen this stuff before

a22ebc3f2111a2f1.voiceContent: Leave me aloâ€” Ahh, never mind! Let's go

a4dfa06499de34c2.voiceContent: My life is nearly completely devoid of meaning. Nothing remains but groggy stupor after sleeping, delusional fantasies from novels, and the comfort at the bottom of a bottle

a4ee04dabba7e5b0.voiceContent: I am Citlali from the Masters of the Night-Wind. I have read the stars and seen the future through the obscuring smoke. You shall be blessed with good fortune and have the aid of powerful allies during your journey. Allow me to join you â€” Hey, I can be serious! Stop looking at me like that

a9b7495b7f7a2325.voiceContent: You really have to ask? I pretend not to care about anything as a shield. In reality, all I do is worry about things

af4768cfc4caa795.voiceContent: Here's to a life where the drinks keep flowing and the Mora keeps rolling

b2154910785fbb96.voiceContent: *yawn* Morning. The last time I woke up this early, I was still a student. Now that I'm a master, I get to sleep in. Anyway, what do you need

b9800a3bb5f6ee97.voiceContent: Each Tzitzimitl contains the bones of small animals, which is kind of a creepy technique if you think about it. So, when it comes to people being afraid of me... I guess I bear, maybe, ten percent of the responsibility. But, I don't harm any animals! I just find the bones in the wild

b98e48c4e21cd918.voiceContent: Between me and Mualani, I honestly don't know who owes who anymore. She breaks my door, owes me Mora, steals my food, but then she brings me snacks and pays for other things... It's too hard to keep track. I'm more than happy to just call it even at this point. Anything to get her to stop waking me up at eleven in the morning... Oh, I mean, um... Never mind! She just startles me with her knocking, that's all

baeb967891982737.voiceContent: I don't quite... get the point of sour foods. You eat when you're hungry, drink when you're thirsty, and sleep when you're tired. If sour foods are meant to whet the appetite, doesn't that mean you weren't hungry in the first place

bc9c1385bdfa28dc.voiceContent: Evening! Areas with large amounts of phlogiston activity are warm no matter what, but in more remote parts of Natlan, the temperature really drops at night, so remember to bundle up. Huh? You didn't ask? Well, I'm telling you anyway

be0ff64d635c15b1.voiceContent: Hmm, this doesn't feel like a divination technique from beyond this world. My school of shamanism relies on the earth rather than the sky. When the fake inauspicious stars show their teeth, I bind them with the spirit of the earth, the bones of dead animals, and the power of the obscuring smoke

cc42865344873554.voiceContent: It takes two weeks for a serialized Inazuma novel to reach Natlan, and a whole year for the chapters to come out in a single volume. I'm not sure if there's some kind of deeper meaning behind this, but during those two weeks, there are so many crazy spoilers and leaks. It's impossible to tell speculation from complete misinformation

d16ff984c4ff0892.voiceContent: Oh, these wine bottles? The Saurian Relics Association found them... No, no, they're not mine. Heh, tossing them carelessly like this... Ororon must have drank them! Isn't that right, Ororon!? Come out and apologize! My tolerance is high, you see, so I don't get drunk easily. Even when I am drunk, I never litter like this. Besides, the Association said they were found in the wild. Oh! In a completely harmless location, of course â€” NOT that it matters, anyway, because I wasn't the one who tossed them, and... Who cares! Just trust me

d7d6645ee16e3df8.voiceContent: She's someone who completely ignores the rumors about me and doesn't go overboard with friendliness. So, I always feel comfortable around her. Oh! Not that I feel uncomfortable around you! I'm just... overthinking everything, as usual... Great, now you know that, too

db23ea8602b0b87b.voiceContent: Ah, looks like someone's interested! Mirage Warriors is a fantasy novel by Nakajima Jun â€” it's one of the oldest and most renowned works to come out of Yae Publishing House. The story takes place in an island kingdom known as Ashihara. The protagonist for most of the chapters is Higashi no Sankun, a feline-headed hermit who came from across the eastern seas, but their true identity is actually the ancient vassal, the Viceroy of the East. The story is incredibly long... The author changed three times, but in the end, the truth of the Houko was still never revealed..

dd06ad1b8bc0b8bd.voiceContent: You two â€” time to end them

ee0f0d0a866239c2.voiceContent: Is it too much to carry? Here, lemme help

efc41018914f6d04.voiceContent: A perfect day to stay home and read

f2b0b7ae75337d69.voiceContent: You want me to explain anyway? *sigh* There's an unspoken tradition in my tribe. Shaman masters deliberately foster rivalries between their students and a rival master. That way, if the students want to defeat that master without getting obliterated, they need to work hard to surpass the previous generation. Most of the shamans in the tribe belong to the school founded by my friend. They chose me as the evil witch to defeat, so what can I do? I'm not trying to make their lives difficult! It's not my fault none of them can put up a fight! *sigh* Anyway, the rumors about me being a terrifying old hag... That's how it all started

f3a5032539571865.voiceContent: The small thing that follows him around is a nasty piece of work. Oh, Kinich is a friend of yours? Huh, what else can I say about him... He's pretty reliable, I suppose
